excerpt: I asked Elon Musk's Grok AI for the Top 5 Stocks to Buy for 2025! so AI chatbots have really been all the Rave these past couple years and more recently one of the biggest new entrance to rise in popularity is Elon musk's grock AI which is actually integrated into x what was formerly Twitter now normally to get access to grock you have to pay for a premium membership on X however there's actually a cool website that lets you play around with any AI chatbot that you want to so I chose the newest version of of grock and I asked the AI to give us what it thinks are the top five best stocks to buy for 2025 and Beyond so in today's video I'll run through these options that it gave us. for grock I worded my question like this I said give me the top five best stocks to buy for 2025 and Beyond. and so here are the results that it gave us. grock says despite its size Microsoft's forward-looking investments in AI cloud computing and gaming provide growth at a reasonable price. Gro says expansion in cloudservices with Azure advancements in AI through Integrations in all of its products. grock yeah it CHS it as a lowrisk option. and grock decided to go with the finance and payment process giant Visa. Gro says continued Global shift towards electronic payments. Gro says Visa's business model is less susceptible to economic downturns. grock gave us asml holding. Gro says as demand for smaller more powerful chips grow. grock decided to go with the e-commerce giant Shopify. reasonable valuation uh Gro says while high compared to traditional metrics. grock says as eCommerce continues to grow globally. Gro says competition from other e-commerce platforms. grock actually gave us a biotech in crisper therapeutic. for the valuation grock says given the speculative nature of Biotech. speaking of future growth potential grock says if successful crisper could offer treatments. Gro say the technology is still in relatively early stages. I actually love this list here from Gro I think it did a very good job of giving us several different options with a mixture of growth and even value depending on you know how you look at these how you value them but but I personally would be totally fine owning any of these five stocks myself so I like the list.
